Articles.Content:
LCS adds water spray to the launchpad, to keep it cool when your engines are blasting heat down on it. There are going to be 20 different types of nozzles, added incrementally over several updates. For all your cooling needs, use LCS water nozzles! Check out the Falcon 9 nozzles!

V0.1

No release yet... sorry about that.

I've been waiting for something like this for awhile. Thanks for making this. No offense, but are you by chance going for a "kerbal" approach to the naming and description? If so that's fine, but just incase you dont know its called a water suppression system. It's main use is to damped the noise made by the engines. The acoustic waves will bounce back up and damage the rocket. The sound would also damage the launch pad if it weren't suppressed.

Edited May 21, 2016 by Motokid600

I messed around with some modified "Puff" engines to make a Sound Suppression System once. It was a lot of fun, but it was also something like 80 parts just for the launch tower. Would love a more integrated system. Here's a video I made using my Kerbo-rigged SSS:

 

Edited May 21, 2016 by blorgon

when will this mod be released? im trying to build a stock game with only realism things like engine lights, and other realism things except for planet realism things and parts, but i absolutely need this.

Edited August 30, 2016 by Neptunian
not enough sauce.
Belerafon hasn't been on since the end of May, so I wouldn't get my hopes up.
